event.title: I Love Free Software Day at the Nerdberg in Nuremberg, Germany

body.p: In Nuremberg we will be gathering in the local Hackerspace Nerdberg to celebrate all the maintainers, contributors and people behind Free Software! Come and join us for our wonderful â€˜I Love Free Software Dayâ€™ celebration!
